https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2U8Bo9chwZDeFWXB2IJC4Dwx5rh.jpg Based on the true story of former professional boxer Iwao Hakamada who has spent over 40 years incarcerated on death row. Iwao Hakamada was arrested for the June 10, 1966 murder of a family in Shizuoka . Iwao Hakamada has always insisted on his innocence and many others also believe Iwao Hakamada has been falsely accused ... Box: Hakamada Case - What is the Life
